Package com.mslab.encryptsms.misc

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BluetoothService
    This class does all the work for setting up and managing Bluetooth connections with other devices.
    Constants
    This class contains all constants.
    Contact
    This class represents a contact.
    Contents
    These are the QR-code contents.
    Contents.Type
    This class stores some types of the QR-code communication protocol.
    Conversation
    This class is a object-representation of the used conversations.
    ConversationsDataSource
    This class represents the interface to the enciphered database to store all conversations in it.
    DatabaseController
    This class controlls all action with the database.
    DHKeyGen
    Helper class for a Diffie-Hellman keyexchange.
    MediaScannerNotifier
    This class helps to detect changes on the storage.
    PhoneNumberDatabaseController
    Controller for the unciphered phonenumber database.
    PhonenumberDataSource
    Abstracted controller for the phone number database.
    PlainDatabaseController
    This class represents the controller for the database to store encrypted messages.
    QRCodeDecoder
    This class decodes the QR-codes used for key and contact details exchange.
    QRCodeEncoder
    QR-code encoder helper class.
    QRCodeReturn
    Helper class to store received QR-codes.
    ReceivedSMS
    Helper class to store received, encrypted messages.
    SentSMS
    This class represents sent messages, that are not completely received by the recipient.
    SMSDataStorage
    This class represents the unciphered datastorage for received messages.
    SMSNotifierHelper
    This class helps to show a notification in notification bar.
    SMSSentDatabaseController
    This controller controls the unciphered sqlite database to store received messages.
    SMSSentDataSource
    Abstracted database interface for managing sent sms.
